title: Staples Center
summary: Staples Center is a multi-purpose arena in Downtown Los Angeles. Adjacent to the L.A. Live development, it is located next to the Los Angeles Convention Center complex along Figueroa Street. The arena opened on October 17, 1999. Beginning on December 25, 2021, the arena will be known as the Crypto.com Arena, after cryptocurrency website Crypto.com purchased the naming rights to the arena.
